title: Seek and Hide (3C112)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Stealth. Skirmish: Spot 2 [Shire] companions to make a minion lose all damage bonuses.
Lore:	A Hobbit's best friends in Moria are the very pillars that support its structure.
Rarity:	C
